description:
In order to understand her roots, Nona watches the last episode of "Planetary Explorer Girl" with Haruto and the others. Seeing the story that unfolds there leads Nona to make a certain decision. Meanwhile, Kanmuri comes to Haruto`s apartment to reveal a shocking truth...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 惑星探査機[うちゅうひこうし]の歌
